text: <@U26B530N6> <@U6GNQ7JBU> can you elaborate on this? We want to have a separate search result page for each language subdirectory (/en, /sv and so on).
You can create regular pages (not system pages) at specific URLs (`/en/search` for instance). You would include modified versions of the Search Input and Search results modules
Where you swap out the HubL token `{{ site_settings.content_search_results_page_path }}` with the slug for that search page (`/en/search` )
you would need a copy of the modules for each language. Or if you only want to make one copy you could add a new field to the modules to allow you define the slug on the page
Oooh, got it. Thanks a million!
